section.title: The encapsulation element information item
section.para: Encapsulation element information items (referred to in this specification as encapsulation elements) are element information items in the CellML 1.2 namespace with local name equal to encapsulation.

listitem.para: Every encapsulation element MUST contain one or more component_ref elements ().

Group element information items (referred to in this specification as group elements) are element information items in the CellML 1.1 namespace with local name equal to group. CellML 1.2 processing software MUST accept both group elements in accordance with the rules below and encapsulation components, but SHOULD generate only the CellML 1.1 group element form.

Relationship reference element information items (referred to in this specification as relationship_ref elements) are element information items in the CellML 1.1 namespace with local name equal to relationship_ref.

Every group element MUST contain one or more relationship_ref elements. A group element SHOULD be silently ignored unless it contains one or more relationship ref_elements which meet the following criteria:
It contains an attribute in the empty namespace with local name relationship and value "encapsulation".
It does not contain a name attribute in the empty namespace.

A group element MAY contain one or more component_ref elements. In the case where the group element is not silently ignored according to the rules above, these component_ref elements SHALL be treated as if they appeared inside an encapsulation element.
